Articles.Content:
The Fafnir Dry Dock

Meant to represent the dragon's massive ribcage as well as serving a purpose of making a useful docking port and refueling station!

http://imgur.com/a/yUoyQ
Very cool design, what would you dock in the little cargo bays of the ribs?
Mini probes right now I'm sending up a bunch of them with KAS winches on them so I can hold ships in place better and refuel them!
